directions: Spray a saucepan with cooking spray and place over medium heat. Cook and stir celery in the hot pan until tender, 6 to 8 minutes. Stir peas into celery and cook until hot, 3 to 4 minutes, stirring often. Add yogurt, milk, parsley, and white pepper and stir until sauce is heated through, about 3 more minutes.
title: Low-Fat Celery and Peas with Cream
